ygData.subject: RE: Black Silk Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Several mobs in MM drop the gloves, I got mine from a Glyphed Aegis -Faras
ygData.messageBody:
Several mobs in MM drop the gloves, I got mine from a Glyphed Aegis


-Faras

> From: Eric Boller [mailto:eboller@...]

>
>
> From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
> A friend of mine said he got Black silk gloves off
> willsappers--not Deathly Ushers. Is this a mistake in
> the lambent gauntlet quest?
>
> Thex
